sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import './Programs.css'; const Programs = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('all'); const [selectedProgram, setSelectedProgram] = useState(null); const sectionRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver( ([entry]) => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { setIsVisible(true); } }, { threshold: 0.2 } ); if (sectionRef.current) { observer.observe(sectionRef.current); } return () => observer.disconnect(); }, []); const programsData = [ { id: 1, title: 'Fashion Design', category: 'design', duration: '3 Years', level: 'Diploma', description: 'Master the art of fashion design with comprehensive training in sketching, pattern making, and garment construction.', features: ['Fashion Illustration', 'Pattern Making', 'Garment Construction', 'Textile Knowledge', 'Fashion History', 'Portfolio Development'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558618666-fcd25c85cd64?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-palette', color: '#667eea', eligibility: '10+2 or equivalent', career: ['Fashion Designer', 'Creative Director', 'Stylist', 'Design Consultant'], fee: '₹1,50,000/year' }, { id: 2, title: 'Textile Design', category: 'design', duration: '2 Years', level: 'Diploma', description: 'Explore the world of textiles with advanced techniques in fabric design, printing, and surface ornamentation.', features: ['Fabric Design', 'Print Design', 'Weaving Techniques', 'Color Theory', 'Surface Ornamentation', 'CAD Design'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1586023492125-27b2c045efd7?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-cut', color: '#764ba2', eligibility: '10+2 or equivalent', career: ['Textile Designer', 'Print Designer', 'Fabric Developer', 'Design Consultant'], fee: '₹1,20,000/year' }, { id: 3, title: 'Fashion Merchandising', category: 'business', duration: '2 Years', level: 'Diploma', description: 'Learn the business side of fashion with comprehensive training in retail, marketing, and brand management.', features: ['Retail Management', 'Brand Marketing', 'Visual Merchandising', 'Fashion Buying', 'Trend Analysis', 'Business Strategy'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441984904996-e0b6ba687e04?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-chart-line', color: '#f093fb', eligibility: '10+2 or equivalent', career: ['Fashion Buyer', 'Brand Manager', 'Retail Manager', 'Marketing Executive'], fee: '₹1,00,000/year' }, { id: 4, title: 'Fashion Styling', category: 'styling', duration: '1 Year', level: 'Certificate', description: 'Master the art of styling with hands-on training in personal styling, editorial styling, and wardrobe consulting.', features: ['Personal Styling', 'Editorial Styling', 'Wardrobe Planning', 'Color Analysis', 'Body Type Analysis', 'Photography Styling'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1469334031218-e382a71b716b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-user-tie', color: '#4facfe', eligibility: '10+2 or equivalent', career: ['Fashion Stylist', 'Personal Stylist', 'Wardrobe Consultant', 'Image Consultant'], fee: '₹80,000/year' }, { id: 5, title: 'Fashion Photography', category: 'media', duration: '1 Year', level: 'Certificate', description: 'Learn professional fashion photography with advanced techniques in lighting, composition, and post-processing.', features: ['Studio Photography', 'Fashion Lighting', 'Model Direction', 'Photo Editing', 'Portfolio Creation', 'Commercial Photography'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1493612276216-ee3925520721?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-camera', color: '#43e97b', eligibility: '10+2 or equivalent', career: ['Fashion Photographer', 'Commercial Photographer', 'Photo Editor', 'Creative Director'], fee: '₹90,000/year' }, { id: 6, title: 'Fashion Journalism', category: 'media', duration: '1 Year', level: 'Certificate', description: 'Develop skills in fashion writing, blogging, and digital media with comprehensive training in fashion communication.', features: ['Fashion Writing', 'Digital Media', 'Content Creation', 'Social Media', 'Fashion Blogging', 'Editorial Skills'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1516762689617-e1cffcef479d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-pen-fancy', color: '#ffd700', eligibility: '10+2 or equivalent', career: ['Fashion Journalist', 'Content Creator', 'Fashion Blogger', 'Social Media Manager'], fee: '₹70,000/year' } ]; const categories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Programs', icon: 'fas fa-th-large' }, { id: 'design', name: 'Design', icon: 'fas fa-palette' }, { id: 'business', name: 'Business', icon: 'fas fa-briefcase' }, { id: 'styling', name: 'Styling', icon: 'fas fa-user-tie' }, { id: 'media', name: 'Media', icon: 'fas fa-camera' } ]; const filteredPrograms = activeCategory === 'all' ? programsData : programsData.filter(program => program.category === activeCategory); const openModal = (program) => { setSelectedProgram(program); document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; }; const closeModal = () => { setSelectedProgram(null); document.body.style.overflow = 'unset'; }; return (
{/* Section Header */}
Our Programs

Choose Your Path to Fashion Excellence

Discover our comprehensive range of fashion programs designed to nurture your creativity and prepare you for a successful career in the fashion industry.

{/* Category Filters */}
{categories.map((category) => ( ))}
{/* Programs Grid */}
{filteredPrograms.map((program, index) => (
{program.level} {program.duration}

{program.title}

{program.description}

{program.features.slice(0, 3).map((feature, idx) => ( {feature} ))} {program.features.length > 3 && ( +{program.features.length - 3} more )}
{program.fee}
{program.eligibility}
))}
{/* Additional Info */}

Flexible Timings

Choose from morning, afternoon, or weekend batches to suit your schedule

Industry Certification

Get certified by leading industry bodies and enhance your career prospects

Placement Support

100% placement assistance with our network of 200+ industry partners

Scholarships Available

Merit-based scholarships up to 50% for deserving and talented students

{/* Program Detail Modal */} {selectedProgram && (
e.stopPropagation()}>
{selectedProgram.level}

{selectedProgram.title}

{selectedProgram.description}

{selectedProgram.duration} {selectedProgram.fee}

Course Features

{selectedProgram.features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature}
))}

Career Opportunities

{selectedProgram.career.map((career, index) => ( {career} ))}

Eligibility

{selectedProgram.eligibility}

)} {/* Background Elements */}
); }; export default Programs;
